Edges-Power -- Male Engro Heroic Adventurer

Agility: d4 Smarts: d10 Spirit: d12 Strength: d8 Vigor: d6
Attribute Notes:
Spirited: +1 Spirit step
Necromantic Weakness: -2 vs. undead effects
Skills (23 Points):
Academics: (sma) d4 Occult: (sma) d10 Spellcasting: (sma) d10
Athletics: (agi) d4 Performance: (spi) d4 Stealth: (agi) d6
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4+1 Persuasion: (spi) d8+1 Survival: (sma) d4
Notice: (sma) d6 Science: (sma) d4 Weird Science: (sma) d6
Skill Notes:
Arcane Background (Song Magic): +1 Common Knowledge/+1 Persuasion/+1 Knowledge (folklore)
Sneaky: +2 Skill Points (choice of Stealth or Thievery)
Arcane Background (Druidism): +1 arcane skill in natural environments, -1 in urban environmonts
Arcane Background (Heahwisardry): -2 arcane skill, +1 per extra round taken (+5 max)
Arcane Background (Hrimwisardry): Arcane skill modified by temperature
Augment Staff (Aura): Staff gives +2 Intimidation or +2 Persuasion
Outsider: -2 Persuasion (other races)
Thin Skinned: -2 vs. Taunt
Size: -1 Deity: Neorthe

Description Notes: Size-1: -1 Size
Features

Feature Notes:
Arcane Background (Hrimwisardry): Treated with deep suspicion
Engro Luck: +1 Benny each session
Stubborn: Never admits error
Combat
Parry: 2 (0) Toughness: 4 (0) Cover: 0 Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: None Shield: None Weapons: Unarmed: 1 (d8+0)
Combat Notes:
Size-1: -1 Toughness
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +3
Arcane Background (Hrimwisardry): -4 damage from cold, +4 from heat
Augment Staff (Damage): Staff does d8+d8 damage and AP 2
Augment Staff (Deflect): Foe ranged attacks -2
Power Surge: Dbl damage from arcane skill attack
Arcana
Power Count: 24 Power Points: 90
Arcana Notes:
Arcane Background (Druidism): Power Count 3/Power Points 10
Arcane Background (Elementalism (Eir)): Power Count 3/Power Points 10
Arcane Background (Elementalism (Ertha)): Power Count 3/Power Points 10
Arcane Background (Elementalism (Fyr)): Power Count 3/Power Points 10
Arcane Background (Elementalism (Waeter)): Power Count 3/Power Points 10
Arcane Background (Heahwisardry): Power Count 3/Power Points 10
Arcane Background (Hrimwisardry): Power Count 2/Power Points 10
Arcane Background (Rune Magic): Power Count 1/Power Points 10
Arcane Background (Song Magic): Power Count 3/Power Points 10
Improved Concentration: Increased Concentration effects
Improved Focus: Increased Focus effects
Alchemy: Can create arcane devices for known spells
Augment Staff (Spell Store): Staff can store 2 known spell(s), cast at +2
Combine Spells: Can cast two spells simultaneously
Concentration: +4 to resist spell disruption
Elemental Mastery: Know 4 elements, cast at -0
Focus: Immediate Spirit roll to recover from Shaken due to spell failure or siphoning
Hellfreeze: Cold spells do normal damage to resistant, half to immune, dbl to vulnerable, and dbl+4 to targets with weakness
Runic Insight: +1 arcane skill die for spells of 3 chosen runes
Spell Finesse (Arcane): +1 Wild Die die on chosen spell skill
Spell Finesse (Armor Penetration): Chosen spell has AP 2
Spell Finesse (Heavy Weapon): Chosen spell counts as heavy weapon
Spell Finesse (Range): Chosen spell has extended range
Spell Finesse (Selective): Can exclude 5 creatures from effects of chosen area spell
